    • Method Detail

      • aiTurn

        public Rank aiTurn()
        This method is how the AI opponent chooses the card he is going to ask the player for. It checks to see if the AI has any multiples in its hand, if so it will ask for that card from the player
        Returns:
        tempR the card the AI player is choosing to ask for.
